question: Which clause of the Aadhaar (Targeted Delivery of Financial and other Subsidies, benefits and services) Act, 2016  defines "biometric information"?
explanation: The Clause 2 (g) of the Aadhaar (Targeted Delivery of Financial and other Subsidies, benefits and services) Act, 2016  defines \"biometric information\"  as photograph, finger print, iris scan, or \"other such biological attributes\" of an individual.
